name: Cucumber and Pea Salad
author: Allrecipes Magazine
summary: Cucumbers meet peas in this creamy side dish garnished with finely chopped walnuts and basil leaves.
ingredients: ½ cup shredded baby basil leaves, divided
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons finely chopped walnuts, or to taste
directions: Fill a large bowl with ice and cold water
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add peas and cook uncovered until bright green, 2 to 3 minutes
Drain in a colander and immediately immerse in ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process
Whisk Greek yogurt, olive oil, and lemon juice together in a bowl
Add parsley, 1/4 cup basil, salt, and pepper
Stir in baby peas and cucumbers
Garnish with remaining basil and walnuts
